Class FolderGenPlugin

java.lang.Object
  com.lars_albrecht.foldergen.plugin.classes.FolderGenPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFolderGenPlugin
Direct Known Subclasses:
CopyWorker, DefaultContentWorker, FileWorker, FolderWorker
public abstract class FolderGenPlugin
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFolderGenPlugin

FolderGenPlugin is the base class for all plugins (workers and replacers).

Version:
1.0.0.0
Author:
lalbrecht
